docs.lead_paragraph: Located on the banks of the Missouri River, the Command and General Staff College at this 123year-old base is the post-graduate school of the United States Army. It ranks as the world's leading Army school for the education of officers in command of land forces.

docs.snippet: A 29-year-old former paratrooper, the manager of his father's securities office, was held in $50,000 bail yesterday in Felony Court on a charge that he had stolen $150,000 from fifty clients in an unsuccessful attempt to score a financial coup by...
docs.lead_paragraph: A 29-year-old former paratrooper, the manager of his father's securities office, was held in $50,000 bail yesterday in Felony Court on a charge that he had stolen $150,000 from fifty clients in an unsuccessful attempt to score a financial coup by speculating in Italian lire.
docs.abstract: Gudenzi, P: held, NYC, for swindling father's securities clients out of $150,000
